name: Pitchbingo
body:
### Pitch Bingo
Founders often make similar mistakes when pitching, skipping information thatâ€™s needed for a proper evaluation, or over-selling rather than internalising the feedback.

Give each evaluator a stack of bingo cards, so they can simply hand them to the presenter after the pitch.
The founders then have a tangible take-away of what aspects they need to improve to move the investor or 
programme relationship forward.

[Download the Pitch Bingo card here](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/6606104/Founder-Centric%20Public/Pitch%20Bingo.pdf)


### Made By [Founder Centric](http://foundercentric.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
